validations.required: This field is required. Don't leave it blank.
validations.requiredIf: This field is required due to the given condition.
validations.requiredUnless: This field is required unless the condition is met.
validations.minValue: The value must be greater than or equal to {min}.
validations.maxValue: The value must be less than or equal to {max}.
validations.between: The value must be between {min} and {max}.
validations.alpha: Only letters are allowed (no numbers or symbols).
validations.alphaNum: Only letters and numbers are allowed (no special characters).
validations.integer: Must be a whole number (no decimals).
validations.decimal: Must be a valid decimal number, use dot (.) as separator.
validations.email: Enter a valid email address (example: user@domain.com).
validations.sameAs: The value must match the required field.
validations.regex: The value does not match the expected format.

custom.phone: Enter a valid phone number with country code (example: +1 555 123 4567).
custom.date: Enter a valid date in YYYY-MM-DD format.
custom.unique: This value is already registered. It must be unique.

placeholder: Enter a value in this field.
hasNumber: Must contain at least one number (0-9).
hasLowerCase: Must contain at least one lowercase letter (a-z).
hasUpperCase: Must contain at least one uppercase letter (A-Z).
hasSpecialChar: Must contain at least one special character: (!@#$%&*().-_).
hasMinLength: Must be at least 8 characters long without spaces.
confirmation: Password confirmation does not match the entered password.
